Institutions, essays and maxims, political, moral & divine divided into four centuries. Enchiridion Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.
[23], 286, [3] p.
Printed for Sam. Briscoe ..., London : 1695.
A reprint of his Enchiridion with slight differences in arrangement of material. Issued in 1698 as the work of George Savile, 1st marquis of Halifax. Advertisements: p. [1]-[2] at end. Reproduction of original in Yale University Library. Includes index.
=======

A reprint of his Enchiridion with slight differences in arrangement of material. Issued in 1698 as the work of George Savile, 1st marquis of Halifax. Advertisements: p. [1]-[2] at end. Reproduction of original in Yale University Library. Includes index.
